thread.title: My new "go to" hotel in Manhattan!
thread.title_full: My new "go to" hotel in Manhattan! - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kenny M
title: My new "go to" hotel in Manhattan!
text:
First let me say...Wow! I am blown away by how I was treated at this hotel. The attention to Customer Service is by far the best I have experienced in the New York City or anywhere else for that matter. I arrived and there was a problem (my fault) with my reservation. Nana, at the Front Desk, took care of everything. Got me a nice room and took care of my problem with the help of the Manager, Irfin. I have not stayed here in a while but now I will not stay anywhere else. Just an amazing experience you just don't get anymore at hotels. Fantastic job, keep doing what you are doing. I'll be back again and again!
Room Tip: If Nana is working, see him. He is awesome and will make sure you have a great room and a great sta... See more room tips
